attributes.action: encourage NICE to come to some agreement between scientists and the medical profession about Vitamin D
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Is Vitamin D, sythesised through sunlight, good or bad for you ? I'm really not sure, after so many years of speculation - in Russia, where daylight hours are limited, sunbed treatments are prescribed in schools but in the UK. individuals are warning about the detrimental effects of the rays and raising awareness of cancer risks and skin care. The petitioner is urging the P.M. to make some guidelines on,

a) amount of sunlight hours per day recommended
b) best practice at the sun centre
c) govt recommendations on sun block (ie non - commercial)
d) Vit D supplements

Please design a health promotion leaflet that focuses especially on pregnant women, discharging babies after phototherapy etc.
Especially

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
